resources.string: A lesson must be selected first.
A lesson must be selected first.
Audio options saved. Press back to return.
Backup file will be placed on SD card at
By phrase duration times this number
The previously defined class no longer exists. Please load language file(s) as needed.
The class title for this lesson was found in the list of classes. What was read was Class: %1$s for lesson %2$s.
Class: %1$s and Lesson: %2$s for this lesson phrase not defined on Class and/or Lesson tabs.
Congratulations! You have reached the end of this lesson.

Deleted teacher, classes, lessons and language phrases(if not used elsewhere) for 

Teacher: %1$s 

Language to be learned: %2$s 

Known Language: %3$s

All classes, lessons and language phrases(if not used elsewhere) will be deleted for 
Teacher: %1$s 
Language to be learned: %2$s 
Known Language: %3$s
Do you want to cancel the current operation?
An error occurred when audio file was attempted to be played. No further attempts will be made to play audio during this lesson.

Invalid Order, speaker, or interval number on LessonPhrase line for Class: %1$s, Lesson: %2$s. Order and Speaker must be numbers but are Order: %3$s, Speaker: %4$. Inteval may be blank or number and is %5$s. Please check your spreadsheet and recreate file.
Invalid number of repeats. It must be a number between %1$d and %2$d.
Invalid number for Wait this many seconds. The values must be between %1$f and %2$f or the value must be 0 if the value of %3$s is not zero.
Invalid number for Pause X times duration. The values must be between %1$f and %2$f or the value must be 0 if the value of %3$s is not zero.
An error occurred in playing a media file. The MediaPlayer error is error code: %1$d additional code: %2$d.
Error reading language file %1$s. Load cancelled.
Invalid order number for class. Please check your spreadsheet and recreate file. What was read for Class: %1$s and Order:%2$s (should be a number).
Invalid order number for lesson. Please check your spreadsheet and recreate file. What was read for Class: %1$s for Lesson: %2$s was: %3$s (should be a number).
Invalid order number for a lesson phrase. Please check your spreadsheet and recreate file.

Language File Details: 
 %1$s.

Press Load to load language file or Cancel.
LessonPhrase %1$s from Class: %2$s, Lesson: %3$s, Order: %4$s, Speaker:%5$s may not be listed in column A on the LanguagePhrase tab in the spreadsheet. Please check and recreate the file.
The %1$d line of the lesson is missing the language phrase. Error info - teacher: %2$s, class: %3$s, lesson: %4$s. Database may be corrupt. Try reloading the language file.
The %1$d line of the lesson is missing a crossreference to the phrase. Error info - teacher: %2$s, class: %3$s, lesson: %4$s. Database may be corrupt. Try reloading the language file.
The %1$s file could not be found. It should be in: %2$s.
Lesson description. Some long description to wrap text to multiple lines
The previously defined lesson no longer exists. Please load language file(s) as needed.

A lesson phrase is missing from the LanguagePhrase tab. Word/phrase %1$s from Class: %2$s, Lesson: %3$s, Order: %4$s, Speaker:%5$s is not listed in column A on the LanguagePhrase tab in the spreadsheet. Please check and recreate the file.
Looks like there was an error loading the lesson. Has a language file been loaded? And loaded successfully?
Media files must be stored in directory
%1$s to be used to store audio/video media exists but is not a directory. Either delete this before loading language file or change the media directory name in the language file.
The media directory %1$s was not successfully created. You may need to create this directory manually.
The media directory %1$s was not successfully deleted. You may need to delete this directory manually.
Name of class for order %1$s must not be spaces.
No class selected. Use the menu to select a class.
No classed defined for this teacher. Load langauge file that contains classes and lessons.
No languages defined for this teacher. Load langauge file that contains languages defined for the teacher.
It doesn\'t look like a language file has been loaded yet. Use the menu option to load a file. The file must be loaded to and named: %1$s
No lesson selected. Use the menu to select a lesson.
No teachers defined. Load language file that contains teacher(s).
No lessons defined for this class. Load language file that contains lessons.
No lesson phrases defined for this lesson. Load language file that contains lesson phrases.
One or the other values of \'%1$s\' or \'%2$s\' must be zero.
One or the other values of \'%1$s\' or \'%2$s\' must be non-zero.
Options have changed. Click Save to save or Cancel to Ignore.
Pause between repeats by phrase duration times this amount
Pause audio phrase duration times this amount
The backup will overwrite any existing backup. Press Backup to continue else cancel"
Press Load to load language file or Cancel
The restore will overwrite your existing activity database. Press Restore to continue else cancel"
Restore file will be read from above backup location
An error occurred in opening the language database
The previously saved teacher no longer exists. Please load language file(s) as needed.
The teacher/language record can not be found (It was here a minute ago). The delete operation is ending in error (but perhaps all is really OK?)
Languages no longer defined for this teacher. Do you need to reload language file?
Text options saved. Press back to return.
Title of lesson for Class: %1$s Order %2$s must not be spaces.

The TeacherLanguage record must have at least a \'TeacherLanguage\' value plus a teaching language and media fields and known language and media fields (these last two can contain spaces). It has just %1$s.
Too few class fields. Please check/correct the Class tab on the spreadsheet and recreate file. What was read was %1$s.
Too few lesson fields. Please check/correct the Lesson tab on the spreadsheet and recreate file. The lesson line read contained: %1$s.
Too few lesson phrase fields.There should be at least 7 fields. What was read was %1$s. Please check/correct the LessonPhrase tab on the spreadsheet and recreate file.
Too few language phrase fields. Please check/corrent the LanguagePhrase tab on the spreadsheet and recreate file. These is what was read: %1$s.
Undefined maintenance status value. It is %1$d.
Unexpected Exception on loading language file.
Wrong number of lesson phrase fields. Please check your spreadsheet and recreate file.
The Teacher record must have at least the \'Teacher\' value plus teacher name and teacher URL(may be blank) field. \n It has just %1$s.
